TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PipeOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides options for creating a <see cref="T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream"> object. This enumeration has a <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the PipeOptions enumeration to specify advanced pipe options.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions Asynchronous = int32(1073741824)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the pipe can be used for asynchronous reading and writing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that there are no additional parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions WriteThrough = int32(-2147483648)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the system should write through any intermediate cache and go directly to the pipe.
